content:
Prodam divx, mp3, flash player

4" ekran, vgrajen FM radio tuner
1 Gb internega spomina, 
nov in Å¡e nerabljen

Prodam za samo 40 eur
Maribor oz po dogovoru na miranUS@gmail.com

Features:

    * Type : Portable multimedia player
    * Memory Capacity : 1GB 4GB SD card
    * Removable Memory : SD/MMC memory card reader
    * LCD Screen : 4" TFT-LCD screen480 x 272 RGB resolution
    * Supported file formats : Video: ASF (MPEG-4), AVIAudio: MP3, WMA, WAVPhoto: JPEG, BMP, GIF, PNGFlash:Macromedia Flash Lite 2.1E-book: TXT
    * Audio Input :
    * Record Function :
    * Audio Output : Headphones jack
    * Software :
    * Compatible Platforms :
    * Accessories included : Manual, headphones, AV cable, USB cable, mains adapter
    * Manual : Information available soon
    * Dimensions (mm) : 108 x 72 x 16.6
    * Weight (g) : 160
    * Multimedia Functions : Line-in video (TV/DVD/VCD/VCR/DV etc.) recording function in ASF (MPEG-4) or AVI formatFM Radio 87.5-108MHZ
    * Advanced Functions :
    * Interface : RCA NTSC video output / PAL compatibleUSB 2.0
    * Other : CalculatorCalendarIn-built rechargeable 1800mAH lithium battery
    * Battery life : Video playback: 4 hrsAudio playback: 8 hrs
author: Odyssey
